blueprint.description: Automates the process of installing PiHole with Cloudflared (encrypted DNS)
blueprint.overview: [Pi-hole](https://pi-hole.net/) is a Linux network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application which acts as a DNS sinkhole and optionally a DHCP server, intended for use on a private network. It is designed for low-power embedded devices with network capability, such as the Raspberry Pi, but supports any Linux machines.
blueprint.name: PiHole
blueprint.title: PiHole
